mapper.update: update goods set id=#{id},goodName=#{goodName},goodType=#{goodType},classifyId=#{classifyId},inventoryNum = #{inventoryNum},purPrice =#{purPrice},salePrice= #{salePrice},recentPurPrice = #{recentPurPrice}, recentSalePrice = #{recentSalePrice},alarmNumber = #{alarmNumber} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from goods where id like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or goodName like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or goodType like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%') or classifyId like CONCAT('%',#{key},'%')
